messages.title: Real change for Britain
messages.content: Everywhere I go I meet people who feel let down by a Labour Government that seems to have simply lost touch with real life. Labour have been in power too long and it's time for change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Focus on real changes that cannot be delivered by Labour or Conservatives.
Fighting for a better deal for troops, highlighting the poor payment and lack of necessary equipment.

mentions.tacticalSituation: It's between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives in Winchester.

issues.defence: A scandal that British troops fighting for our country are paid a pittance and do not have the equipment they need.
issues.economy: Fighting for jobs, the environment, and fairer taxes.
issues.environment: Local campaigner Martin Tod is part of a growing force of Liberal Democrats fighting for action on the environment.

community.content: Martin Tod has built a strong record of action for local people - working hard to get a better deal for you.

leaflet.personalStatement: Everywhere I go I meet people who feel let down by a Labour Government that seems to have simply lost touch with real life. Labour have been in power too long and it's time for change.

contactInformation.address: House of Commons, Westminster, London, SW1A 0AA

examples: Labour have been in power too long and it's time for change.

It's between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives in Winchester.
Everywhere I go I meet people who feel let down by a Labour Government.
What’s even worse is that they don't have the equipment they need to do the job.
Local campaigner Martin Tod has built a strong record of action for local people - working hard to get a better deal for you.
Labour have been in power too long and it's time for change.
It's between the Lib Dems and the Conservatives in Winchester.
